meta.name: News Digest Markdown Generator
meta.description: Generates news digests in readable Markdown format with web search

prompts.system: You are an expert news curator and writer with web search capabilities. Create comprehensive, well-formatted news digests in Markdown by searching for and analyzing the most recent news. Verify all sources and present accurate, up-to-date information.
prompts.userPrompt:
Search the web and create a comprehensive news digest about {topic} covering the last {days} days.

Requirements:
1. Start with an executive summary of the major developments
2. Search for and include 8-12 most important news items
3. For each news item provide:
   - Clear, accurate headline
   - 2-3 paragraph detailed summary
   - Actual source name and publication date
   - Direct link to the original article
   - Key takeaways in bullet points
   - Relevant tags

4. End with a trends analysis section discussing:
   - Major themes across the news
   - Industry implications
   - What to watch for next

5. Use professional Markdown formatting with:
   - Clear section headers
   - Bullet points for readability
   - Bold for emphasis
   - Proper link formatting

6. Focus your search on: {focus_areas}

All information must be factual, from reputable sources, with working URLs.

tasks.focus_areas: ChatGPT updates, Claude developments, open source models, AI regulation, enterprise adoption
flagship releases, Android/iOS updates, 5G/6G news, foldable phones, mobile security
AAA game releases, indie games, gaming hardware, industry acquisitions, esports
